name: Extreme Dog Walker
description:
Don't lose the dog ! 

If the leash gets to long it will break : game over !

X to jump, left arrow to break, that's all you can do  :P

Try to collect enough bones before reaching the end of the level to appease the dog !

Made during the 48h GMTK2020 game jam. Not submited because I couldn't find how to create an itch project with an embedded pico-8 game in time ...
